V smuku bo izzvala tudi Ilko
Mikaela Shiffrin se bo posvetila tudi kraljevski disciplini. Na družabnih omrežjih je navdušila s kitaro.
06 Nov 2019, 12:31 by Mojca Finc
LJUBLJANA – Prva zvezdnica belih strmin Mikaela Shiffrin v novi smučarski sezoni brani štiri lovorike, veliki kristalni globus in tri male; v slalomu, veleslalomu in superveleslalomu. Zelo radovedna je, kako daleč lahko poseže še v smuku. Strokovnjaki se sprašujejo, ali lahko osvoji globuse v vseh disciplinah. »Prejšnja zima je bila izjemna, morda celo preveč. Zato moram biti tudi realna,« je previdna 24-letnica.V novo sezono za svetovni pokal – nadaljevala se bo 23. t. m. s slalomom v Leviju – je startala z največ medijske pozornosti. Shiffrinova že dolgo ni več najstnica z otroškim nastopom, ki postreže s kakšnim brezglavim odgovorom, temveč dama, ki skrbno in načrtno gradi javno podobo. V pripravljalnem obdobju je na družabnih omrežjih sledilcem odprla vrata v svojo zasebnost, pokazala je prostore nove hiše pa tudi druge talente. Navdušila je s posnetkom, na katerem igra kitaro in prepeva.»V preteklosti se mi je zdelo, da bi morala to zadržati zase. Zdaj se malo bolj udobno počutim tudi v tem, da svoj prosti čas delim z javnostjo,« je pojasnila šampionka, ki se je po dveh letih razšla s francoskim veleslalomistom Mathieujem Faivrejem. 
Spet bo prisluhnila telesu
V prejšnji zimi je dosegla rekordnih 17 zmag v svetovnem pokalu. In to ni bil edini mejnik, ki ga je izboljšala. »Ne bom lagala, da rekordi niso pomembni. Vedno ga je lepo doseči. Upam pa, da se bom ob vsakem počutila, kot da je bil to le še en oddelan dan v pisarni. Nikakor si ne želim, da bi bili rekordi tisto, kar bi me motiviralo – da bi presegli mojo strast do športa in tekmovalni duh,« se trudi, da bi ostala ljubezen do smučanja na prvem mestu.Nekateri zvezdniki, kot sta Lindsey Vonn in Bode Miller, so lani izrazili začudenje, da se ne udeležuje vseh tekem. Odločno se je odzvala, da je to pač njena pot. V njeni ekipi so premišljeno izbirali preizkušnje, na katerih je nastopala, da ne bi pregorela. »Spet bom poslušala svoje telo. Ne bom tekmovala na vseh prizoriščih,« se Shiffrinova zaveda svojih meja. »Skupaj s trenerji ustvarimo več načrtov, imamo jih skorajda za celotno abecedo in iščemo pravega, takšnega, pri katerem bom največ izvlekla od tekem, treninga in počitka, zraven pa še uživala,« je razkrila strategijo, h kateri jo je pred leti spodbudil tudi nasvet Tine Maze.V pripravljalnem obdobju je opravila več treningov s tekmicami kot v preteklosti, se je pa manj posvečala paradni disciplini. »Slalom mi je najbolj pri srcu, je kot moj najboljši prijatelj. A hkrati je prva disciplina, ki jo dam na stran, ko hočem trenirati druge. V tem poletju ga nisem vadila skoraj nič. Ampak vsakič ko se ga lotim, se občutki hitro obudijo.Motivacija je visoka v vsaki disciplini, tudi slalomu,« pravi zmagovalka 60 tekem za svetovni pokal, ki ima na večni lestvici pred sabo le še štiri legende – Annemarie Moser-Pröll (62), Marcela Hirscherja (67), Vonnovo (82) in Ingemarja Stenmarka (86).

She will also challenge Ilko in the skiing
Mikaela Shiffrin will also dedicate herself to royal discipline. On social media, she has impressed with the guitar.
06 Nov 2019, 12:31 by Mojca Finc
LJUBLJANA - Mikaela Shiffrin, the first White Slopes star, defends four laurels, a large crystal globe and three small ones in the new ski season; in slalom, giant slalom and super giant slalom. She is very curious about how far she can go in skiing. Experts wonder if he can win globes in all disciplines. “Last winter was exceptional, maybe even too much. That's why I have to be realistic, "the 24-year-old is careful. The new season for the World Cup will continue on May 23. m. with slalom in Levi - started with the most media attention. For a long time, Shiffrin is no longer a teenage child with a childish appearance, but with a headless answer, but a lady who carefully and deliberately builds a public image. During the preparation period, she opened the door to her privacy on social media, showing off the premises of the new house as well as other talents. She impressed with the recording of her playing the guitar and singing. "In the past, it seemed to me that she should keep it to herself. Now I feel a little more comfortable sharing my free time with the public, ”explained the champion, who split with French giant slalom Mathie Faivre after two years.
She will listen to her body again
Last winter, she achieved a record 17 World Cup wins. And that was not the only milestone that improved her. "I'm not going to lie that records don't matter. It is always nice to reach him. But I hope every time I feel like it was just another separated day in the office. By no means do I want the records to be what motivated me - to transcend my passion for sports and competitive spirit, "she strives to remain a love of skiing in the first place. Some celebrities like Lindsey Vonn and Bode Miller, last year expressed surprise at not attending all the matches. She firmly responded that this was her path. Her team thoughtfully chose the trials she performed to keep from getting burned. “I will listen to my body again. I’m not going to compete in all the venues, ”Shiffrin is aware of her boundaries. "Together with the coaches, we create more plans, we have almost the whole of the alphabet and we are looking for the right one, the one that I will get the most out of the races, training and rest and enjoy," she revealed the strategy, which was encouraged by her years ago Tina Maze's advice.In the preparatory period she completed more training with competitors than in the past, but less devoted to parade discipline. “Slalom is my best friend, it's like my best friend. But at the same time, it is the first discipline that I put aside when I want to train others. I practiced almost nothing this summer. But every time I tackle it, feelings quickly recover. Motivation is high in every discipline, including slalom, "says 60 World Cup winner, with only four legends ahead of her - Annemarie Moser-Pröll (62) , Marcel Hirscher (67), Vonnov (82) and Ingemar Stenmark (86).
